description.original: Adds Properties to multiple notes at once.  Either right-click a folder, or select multiple notes and right-click the selection.
description.translation: Adds Properties to multiple notes at once.  Either right-click a folder, or select multiple notes and right-click the selection.

dict.Notice(\"Delimiter must be a single char: Notice("分隔符必须是单个字符。")
dict.Notice(\"Please check at least one prope: Notice("请检查至少一个要删除的属性。")
dict.Notice(\"No files to add properties to.\: Notice("没有要添加属性的文件。", 4e3)
dict.Notice(\"No files to remove properties f: Notice("没有要从中删除属性的文件。", 4e3)
